selected_events.arc_title: The Surgical Interns: Rivalries, Bonds, And Coming Of Age At Seattle Grace
selected_events.content: The interns gossip about Meredith's mother, Ellis Grey, with Cristina expressing envy and Izzie expressing admiration.

subtitles: 1: [00:18:59,177 - 00:19:00,038] Intern (likely Izzie Stevens) / Alex Karev (PVM): I'm with Jeremy.
2: [00:19:00,440 - 00:19:01,402] Alex Karev / Alex Karev (PVM): You're with the Nazi, right?
3: [00:19:01,540 - 00:19:02,844] Intern (likely Cristina Yang) / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): She may not have pneumonia, you know.
4: [00:19:02,884 - 00:19:04,866] Intern (likely Cristina Yang) / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): She could be splinting or have a PE.
5: [00:19:05,367 - 00:19:08,432] Alex Karev / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Alex Karev (PVM): Like I said, I hate nurses.
6: [00:19:08,452 - 00:19:09,193] Izzie Stevens / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): What did you just say?
7: [00:19:11,137 - 00:19:12,259] Izzie Stevens / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): Did you just call me a nurse?
8: [00:19:12,799 - 00:19:17,868] Alex Karev / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Alex Karev (PVM): Well, if the white cat fits.
9: [00:19:17,890 - 00:19:18,990] Dr. Bailey / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): Damn it, Katie.
subtitles_in_original_event: Izzie Stevens / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): The Nazi hates me.
Cristina Yang / Dr. George O'Malley (PVM): The Nazi's a resident.
Cristina Yang / Dr. George O'Malley OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): I have attendings hating me.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): You know Meredith is inbred?
Izzie Stevens / Dr. George O'Malley OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Like it's uncommon around here to be a doctor's parent.
Cristina Yang / Dr. George O'Malley OR Dr. Meredith Grey OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): No, royally inbred.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Her mother is Alice Gray.
Izzie Stevens / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Dr. Izzie Stevens OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Shut up, the Alice Gray.
George O'Malley / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): Who's Alice Gray?
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Dr. Cristina Yang (PVM): Alice.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Where'd you go to med school, Mexico?
Izzie Stevens / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): She was one of the first big chick surgeons.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): I mean, she practically invented the pep double.
Izzie Stevens / Dr. Meredith Grey OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): She's a living legend.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): You know, she won the Harper Avery twice.
George O'Malley / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): So I didn't know one thing.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): Talk about points of pressure.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): God, I would kill to have Ellis Gray as a mother.
Izzie Stevens / Dr. Meredith Grey (PVM): I'd kill to be Ellis Gray.

selected_events.arc_title: Ethical Dilemmas And Moral Growth In Surgical Training
selected_events.content: Meredith accidentally injures Mrs. Patterson's heart during surgery and struggles with whether to confess her mistake.
selected_subtitles: Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Even great doctors make mistakes.
Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): And when we do, we've got to have a chance to be able to speak up without fear of retribution.
Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Or everyone suffers.

subtitles_sent_to_llm: 0: [00:38:26,623 - 00:38:33,570] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): Five years ago, as a CT fellow, I had a nagging feeling that I didn't check the body cavity of a lung patient closely enough before I closed.
1: [00:38:34,271 - 00:38:36,735] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): The patient seemed fine post-op, and I was in a hurry.
2: [00:38:39,097 - 00:38:43,282] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): And yesterday, you and Dr. Bailey pulled a towel out from under that patient's lung.
3: [00:38:44,222 - 00:38:46,846] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Why didn't I report it at an appropriate time?
4: [00:38:46,905 - 00:38:54,454] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Maybe because I was afraid that I would be called into a meeting where some hospital lawyer's fear of liability could end my career.
5: [00:38:55,750 - 00:38:57,271] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Even great doctors make mistakes.
6: [00:38:57,552 - 00:39:02,260] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): And when we do, we've got to have a chance to be able to speak up without fear of retribution.
7: [00:39:03,663 - 00:39:04,422] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Or everyone suffers.
